swoop.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if a bird or aircraft swoops, it moves suddenly down through the air, especially in order to attack something
swoop.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The eagle hovered, ready to swoop at any moment.
swoop.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if the police, army etc swoop on a place, they go there without any warning in order to look for someone or something
swoop.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Drug officers swooped on several addresses in London last night.
swoop.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a sudden surprise attack on a place in order to get something or take people away â€“ used especially in news reports
swoop.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Police arrested a man in a swoop on his house last night.
